title: Philosophy & Feminism: At the Border, The Impact of Feminism on the Arts & Sciences
description: Nye (philosophy, University of Wisconsin-Whitewater) provides an introduction to feminist philosophy from Mary Wollstonecraft to the theorists of the 1970s. She then demonstrates the myriad ways in which contemporary feminist thought challenges basic ideas in the fields of logic, ethics, epistemology, philosophy of language, and political theory.
author: Andrea Nye
